description: An experiment in mixing Hugo and Polymer PRPL into a progressive web app blog.
name: blog-pwa
author: Justin Ribeiro <justin@justinribeiro.com>

scripts.lint: yarn lint:eslint && yarn lint:prettier && yarn lint:css
scripts.build:clean: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build/default/src && mkdir build/default/node_modules
scripts.build:copyDeps: cp -r node_modules/@webcomponents/ build/default/node_modules  && cp -r node_modules/intersection-observer/ build/default/node_modules && cp -r node_modules/prismjs/ build/default/node_modules && cp -r src/polyfill-dynamicimport.js build/default/src
scripts.build:copyRoot: cp index.html build/default && cp robots.txt build/default && cp manifest.json build/default && cp push_manifest.json build/default
scripts.build:copyData: cp -r images/ build/default && cp -r data/ build/default && cp -r helpers/ build/default
scripts.build:dist: yarn build:clean && yarn build:copyDeps && yarn build:copyRoot && yarn build:copyData && yarn build:minify && yarn build:modules
